name: André Duarte
desc: Front-end developer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in creating accessible, responsive, and performance-optimized web interfaces.

meta.title: André Duarte - Front-end developer VueJs | NuxtJs | WordPress | ReactJs

about.title: Hey there! How's it going?
about.text: I'm a front-end developer with over 10 years of experience, passionate about creating accessible, responsive, and performance-focused web interfaces. I work with technologies such as Vue.js, React.js, and AngularJS, always prioritizing interactive solutions and flawless user experiences. I have strong expertise in CSS and semantic HTML, along with solid knowledge of JavaScript, which allows me to develop quickly and efficiently. Currently, I work as a freelancer, dedicating myself to innovative projects and constantly striving to improve my skills.
